item.title: Create shorts from weekly long form video content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor with experience in transforming long-form videos (10-15 minutes on average) into engaging short videos for platforms like YouTube and TikTok.

Responsibilities:

Edit long-form videos into multiple short videos suitable for YouTube Shorts and TikTok.

Create compelling hooks that capture the audience’s attention.

Understand and implement platform-specific strategies to maximise engagement and channel growth.

Maintain the context and narrative of the original content.

Requirements:

Proficiency in English to ensure accurate context comprehension.

Proven experience in editing videos for YouTube and TikTok.

Knowledge of current trends and best practices for short-form content on these platforms.

Ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines.

Trial and Ongoing Work:

The selected candidate will be given one video as a trial.

Upon successful completion of the trial, the candidate will be responsible for editing the weekly vlog starting 11th July.

This is a long-term position with a minimum commitment of 1 year.

If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to create engaging content that can help scale our channel, we’d love to hear from you!


Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: AI Content Creation for Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone with AI and social media expertise to take my own videos (17), google slides (500), and program workbook (160 pages) and chunk it out into draft social media posts. I am sitting on a mountain of content, and I want to start leveraging it to show up consistently on social media. I am also interested in a partner to manage the posting of my content, but this is not essential.

This might look like setting up the project in Canva or copy.ai, for example, and teaching me how to use these tools to leverage my own work and voice into bite-sized posts. I'm open to different processes and investing in different technologies.

I have professionally designed Canva templates, and I like to use Canva or Later to schedule my posts.

I am looking for someone who is interested in really getting to know my content and is obsessed with high-quality work.

The successful candidate will possess the following skills:

- Absolutely fluent in English
- Kind, fun, and creative
- Proficiency in AI algorithms and machine learning techniques
- Willing to teach me the process vs. just create the outputs
- Strong knowledge of video editing and post-production
- Familiarity with Google Suite and content creation platforms
- Creativity and the ability to adapt content for different social media platforms

Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:57 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Illustrator, Instagram, Graphic Design
Skills: Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Illustrator, Instagram, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Art Director Long Term Partnership - Upwork
item.description:
We are a creative studio based in Texas, USA, but functioning fully remotely, with the team spread all around the world. We do video production for US clients and are looking for an art director to join our team, either project-based or full-time.

We call it an "art director," but we're essentially looking for someone who has the skills to transform a brief or a script into something visually stunning. This person should be able to develop video concepts (stories), draw storyboards, and illustrate them. Although Adobe Illustrator (or any other drawing software) is the main tool for illustration, this job also requires proficiency in After Effects. We often need to modify and design on top of templates, and it's efficient to stay within After Effects to make the most of its tools.

Things you'll be doing on a daily basis:

- Defining the visual styles of the videos & brand explorations
- Designing graphic packages for videos (intros, outros, lower thirds, transitions, titles, etc.)
- Storyboards and illustrations

We are looking for someone with a video background who understands how animation works and agrees that the concept/storyline is the most important part when designing storyboards.

Please apply with a portfolio and show us how versatile you are as an artist.

Talk soon!


Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:52 UTC
Category: Art Direction
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Story Development, Film Editing, Concept Artistry
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Story Development, Film Editing, Concept Artistry
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: Create high quality short form content around trading and investing - Upwork
item.description:
Starting monthly budget = $1,000 for 20 videos.

Bonuses will be given for videos that do exceptionally well.

If you deliver with the high quality videos, then price will increase to $1,250 per month for 20 videos.

I am looking for video editors/animators that can edit videos similar to this one by Luke Davis - https://www.instagram.com/reel/C2fMn7Yu9vf/?igsh=bGRkNzY4bnZhd2Ft

If you think you can create these type of videos but you do not understand the crypto market, market cycles, technical analysis, price action, or other concepts that I talk about, you will be given my course to learn everything.

Here is a video that you may choose to edit to show off your skills. Feel free to edit only a portion of the video as it is 2 minutes and 41 seconds long. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QReQyQyFxygFW5ncVRYAICVhxiW8XI-P/view?usp=sharing

If you are responding to this job, please answer this question in your application:

1+8/2=?

Thank you,

Louis Raskin

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:52 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Animation Design, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Animation Design, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: 2D Animator for Explainer Video Production - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking Talented 2D Animator/Video Editor for Engaging Explainer Video Production

Skills Include:
Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, medium-expert skill level on platforms like Adobe After Effects, Blender, or something similar, Graphic Design (a plus), Infographics, Video Explainer Types

Project type/length:
Small - a couple weeks max

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled professional to create three explainer videos for an insurance company with the targeted audience being property owners, managers, and tenants. Each video should have a duration of 45 seconds to 1 minute. The videos should feature 2D animation and infographics where appropriate. We have detailed scripts and descriptions of the animated elements required for each video. Our goal is to find someone who can bring our vision to life and effectively communicate our message through engaging and informative animated content. We will also need a voiceover as well but mainly looking to find a skilled creator to make this.
- Video style example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-bknuFCQn4Y




Hourly Range: $20.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:51 UTC
Category: 2D Animation

Skills: Animated Explainer, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Animate, Adobe Illustrator, Blender, English, Infographic, Graphic Design

item.title: Talking Head Long Form and Short Form Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Apply Only if You Believe You're Qualified and Have a Strong Portfolio

We are seeking Video editors who are proactive, dynamic team players with excellent organizational skills. You should thrive in handling multiple tasks and have a keen eye for detail.
Your strength lies in balancing strategy and creativity. You excel in crafting engaging short-form and long-form content and understanding the nuances of hook creation, pacing, structure, music selection, and graphics.
If you want to learn more about us, check out our CEO, "Alex Mendoza," on @the.mendoza Instagram

Key Responsibilities:
- Edit 15 short-form videos per month and 4 long-form videos per month
- Manage tight deadlines and multiple projects simultaneously.

Qualifications:
- Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro and Cap Cut.
- Fluent in English.
- Knowledge of graphic design is a plus.
- Alignment with The Evolution Group's core values.

Our Values:
- Efficiency: We prioritize swift action without compromising quality.
- Communication: Prompt and rapid responses
- Excellence: Strive for excellence in all you do.
- Attention To Detail

About Us:
The Evolution Group empowers fitness evolution through innovative coaching, offering guaranteed solutions for overweight men. Our editors contribute directly to Alex's content and other key projects.

Benefits:
- Creative Freedom: Innovate and contribute your ideas.
- Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a fast-paced industry.
- Collaborative Culture: Join a supportive and driven team.
- Learning Opportunities: Grow with exposure to industry-leading practices.

You Should Apply If:
- You're dedicated to improving your craft.
- You're willing to invest the time and effort to excel.
- You value constructive criticism and feedback.

Next Steps:
Interested? Complete the application form: (link removed)

If shortlisted, we'll review your portfolio and contact successful candidates for interviews.

Hourly Range: $5.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Reels Editor - Upwork
item.description:
### Job Description: Reels Editor

Looking for a creative wizard to edit high-energy Instagram Reels with a fast turnaround. Must have a sharp eye for detail and the ability to produce engaging content that drives followers.

**Responsibilities:**
- Transform raw footage into captivating Reels.
- Use trending music, dynamic visuals, and compelling text overlays.
- Collaborate remotely to align with our vision and brand style.
- Deliver high-quality edits quickly and efficiently.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience with Instagram Reels or similar short-form content.
- A strong portfolio showcasing your best work.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Creativity, speed, and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication skills for remote collaboration.


Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Audio Editing, Video Production, Proofreading
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Audio Editing, Video Production, Proofreading
Country: Canada

item.title: Need animated Canva image created for website - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to help us create an image template in Canva similar to the one on this website:

https://getinca.com/

It's a cell phone showing a text conversation and the messages are animated. The difference is I want it to be 3 text messages displayed on the screen.

item.title: customer service video Recorder for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
**Read Carefully***
We are looking for an individual with a clear English accent to assist us in recording videos for our YouTube channel. The selected candidate will be responsible for using their own computer to record high-quality videos that align with our content requirements. The videos will be focused on various topics related to our channel's niche. As an ideal candidate, you should have a strong command of the English language, excellent communication skills, and the ability to deliver engaging content. This is a great opportunity for individuals who enjoy being in front of the camera and are passionate about creating captivating video content.

Skills:
- Clear English accent
- Excellent communication skills
- Proficient in video recording/editing tools

Pay : $20 for a 15-30 min video

**********To apply:  
Record a video of yourself using https://www.loom.com/   answering the questions below and share the link with us.  
-Tell us about yourself and your work experience
-Do you have a good camera presence
-What's your experience using technology tools like PowerPoint,  ChatGPT,  Canva?
-What are things that interest you?   
-Why should we hire you?
-Why do you want this job?  
-Explain how you feel like you can help us achieve our goal.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:23 UTC
Category: Email, Phone & Chat Support
Skills:Voice-Over, Video Production, Customer Service, Sales Call, YouTube, Explainer Video, Customer Care, Virtual Assistance, Real Estate Virtual Assistance, Data Entry, Content Creation
Skills: Voice-Over, Video Production, Customer Service, Sales Call, YouTube, Explainer Video, Customer Care, Virtual Assistance, Real Estate Virtual Assistance, Data Entry, Content Creation
Country: United States
